definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Presents the concepts and classification of building atriums.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了建筑中庭的概念及分类。

sentences.english: Huge ravens in the courtyard added to the sad atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 中庭里身形巨大的渡鸦更添悲伤的气氛。

sentences.english: This will be consultative for fireproof design and will be useful for real atrium.
sentences.chinese: 这对实际的中庭防火设计与审核工作具有参考作用。

sentences.english: Place for future completion of the atrium is located in the place of former connecting corridor.
sentences.chinese: 将来完成中庭的地方就是之前的连廊。

sentences.english: All the program volumes link and open to the central atrium.
sentences.chinese: 所有的空间连接了中央中庭并向其打开。

sentences.english: I stood in the atrium's exact center and gaped.
sentences.chinese: 我站在中庭的正中央，目瞪口呆。

sentences.english: Hall front is the enclosed open-air quadrangle, the baptism trough in the quadrangle central committee.
sentences.chinese: 大厅的前面是封闭式的露天中庭，洗礼盆在中庭中央。

sentences.english: Hall front is the enclosed open-air quadrangle, the baptism trough in the quadrangle central committee.
sentences.chinese: 大厅的前面是封闭式的露天中庭，洗礼盆在中庭中央。

sentences.english: A natural light-flooded atrium connects every floor to each other.
sentences.chinese: 洒满自然阳光的中庭连接着各个楼层。

sentences.english: White Tree withered, in the Court it stands.
sentences.chinese: 中庭的的白树，依然枯萎。

sentences.english: Toward the top of the slope the building opens up to form a full height atrium.
sentences.chinese: 中心楼敞向坡顶，形成通高的中庭。

sentences.english: In the podium and Some rooms, I have introduced the concept of the atrium.
sentences.chinese: 在裙房和客房部分，我都引入了中庭的概念。

sentences.english: He has found that smoke and toxic gases can be transported swiftly up through the atrium.
sentences.chinese: 他发现烟和毒害性气体可通过中庭迅速向上传播。

sentences.english: In addition, Le Méridien Xiamen will hold a barbeque on the evening of Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 中秋节当晚艾美酒店将在中庭花园举办中秋烧烤派对。

sentences.english: Entry is through a soaring four-storey-high atrium.
sentences.chinese: 入口是一个穿过四层楼高，直通屋顶的中庭。

sentences.english: The terrace encloses the greened patio in whose centre a tree grows through the open roof.
sentences.chinese: 露台将绿色的中庭围住，一棵大树参天而立。

definition: balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
